ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 14..
ygData.msgSnippet: Lava Basilisks aren t a good idea solo... They can be in the higs teens in lvl, and they can keep you stunned if you are unlucky...
ygData.messageBody:
Lava Basilisks aren't a good idea solo... They can be in the higs teens in
lvl, and they can keep you stunned if you are unlucky...


>From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
>Date: Tue, 06 Jul 1999 00:14:50 -0700
>
>From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>
>I can kill nearly all fire elementals in Lavastorm at level 13, most near
>the entrance /con blue to me... And they give quite a good amount of exp.
>Lava basilisks are good targets as well.
>
>Giltaagin
>
> >From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
> >
> >Try lavastorm, just make sure you have a good pet. and stick to drakes at
> >14, avoid elementals :)
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: johnathan spectre <jspectre@...>
> >To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 7:41 PM
> >Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
> >
> >
> >> From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
> >>
> >> Arrgh.. Does anyone have good suggestions where a 14th level Dark Elf
> >> Necromancer can go hunting and make some exp (hopefully enough to 16)?
> >I've
> >> tried east and west commons, most of the things con green to me (90%)
>and
> >> don't give exp, the rest just kick my ___. I tried Befallen but all
>that
> >> resulted in was a trip back to 13th level twice.
> >>
> >> Help?
> >>
> >> jspectre @ innoruuk
